vote.text: Amendment SA 4924 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4924 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Blumenthal. (consideration: CR S650; text: CR S650) To amend the resolution.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4924 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Blumenthal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4924 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
